basics.name: Nile Jocson

basics.summary: A German-born theoretical physicist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

location.address: 1603 Jerusalem St., Alcove, Ridgecrest, Molino IV

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

publications.name: Ones to Eights: Effect of AVX2 Vectorization on Bresenham's Line Algorithm Speeds for Different Line Sizes and Types
publications.summary: Benchmarking sequential and AVX2-vectorized implementations of Bresenham's Line Algorithm for different line sizes and types, and statistically comparing the results.

projects.name: BitGL
projects.summary: A Win32 Library for basic windowing and graphics, using BitBlt as the method of drawing to screen
